summary: Simple mod that puts all the standing stones together in a room under the Guardian Stones.
descriptionHtml:
-----Description-----
Very simple mod that adds a trap door by the Guardian Stones leading to a small room containing all the Standing Stones.

-----Installation-----
Just drop the esp file into your skyrim data folder, or use the NMM.

-----Plans-----
Possibly include individual and themed rooms for each stone (suggestions welcome)
author: NightCrest
